name: Joe
description:
You're an average Joe. Literally. Your name is Joe A. Verage. You work as a barista. Everybody in town knows you. You have a face. Maybe you get to make some coffee, maybe you don't. I don't know. That's about it. Have fun.
KNOWN BUG: When re-entering town, the start screen appears in the bottom of the screen and the player cannot move. Press "E". This will fix the problem
